patient_info: Abnormality of refraction,Visual loss,Cafe-au-lait spot,Cranial hyperostosis,Large cafe-au-lait macules with irregular margins,Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia,Abnormal shape of the occiput
golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. Neurofibromatosis type 1 (NF1)
2. McCune-Albright syndrome
3. Cherubism
4. Osteogenesis imperfecta type 1 (OI1)
5. Melanotic Xanthogranuloma
6. Lisch nodules with optic glioma
7. Fibrous dysplasia of bone with Mazabraud syndrome
8. Jaffe-Campanacci syndrome
9. LEOPARD syndrome (Lentigines, Electrocardiographic conduction abnormalities, Ocular hypertelorism, Pulmonary stenosis, Abnormalities of genitalia, Retardation of growth, Deafness)
10. Costello syndrome

Each of these conditions shares at least one clinical feature with the patient's phenotype, and they are all rare diseases that could present with a combination of the symptoms described. It is important to note that a thorough clinical evaluation, including family history, physical examination, and appropriate laboratory and imaging studies, would be necessary to confirm any of these diagnoses.
